text: I am thrilled to be invited by Prof. David Lo to visit him and his research group at Singapore Management University in August. See you in Singapore!
I will serve on the Program Committee of The 36th IEEE International Symposium on Software Reliability Engineering (ISSRE) 2025.
I have been selected as a Student Volunteer for FSE 2025!
Our paper “Automated Trustworthiness Oracle Generation for Machine Learning Text Classifiers” got accepted by FSE 2025!
Our paper “UntrustVul: An Automated Approach for Identifying Untrustworthy Alerts in Vulnerability Detection Models” is online at arXiv!
